meanings.sent1: She resets the alarm clock every night before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He resets his password regularly to keep his accounts secure.
meanings.sent3: The magician resets the trick to surprise the audience again.
meanings.sent4: After a long day, a good night's sleep resets your energy levels like magic.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic resets the engine to make the car run smoothly.

meanings.sent1: The resets of the clock were necessary after the power outage.
meanings.sent2: The resets of the game allowed players to start over.
meanings.sent3: The resets of the puzzle made it challenging yet fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: The resets of the system were needed to fix the error.
meanings.sent5: The resets of the competition gave everyone a fair chance to win.

meanings.definition: A device used to reset something
meanings.sent1: The technician used a resets to fix the malfunctioning device.
meanings.sent2: The resets on the computer helped restore it to its original settings.
meanings.sent3: The resets on the phone were handy when it froze unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The resets on the machine ensured it operated smoothly.
